Class AppManager

java.lang.Object
unipd.edids.logicBusiness.AppManager
public class AppManager extends Object
Acts as a Facade for the core application logic, managing sentence analysis, generation, and moderation.

Main Responsibilities: - Provides a simplified interface for the underlying services: - Sentence analysis via AnalyzeSentenceService. - Sentence generation via GenerateSentenceService. - Sentence moderation via ModerationSentenceService. - Manages input and output sentences. - Offers utilities for clearing and retrieving processed sentences. - Handles application configurations via ConfigManager.

Design Pattern: - Implements the Facade pattern to centralize and simplify the access to sentence-related operations by delegating tasks to underlying services while minimizing direct dependencies among components. - Utilizes the Singleton pattern for ConfigManager initialization.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppManager

      public AppManager(ConfigManager configManager)
      Constructs an instance of the AppManager Facade. Initializes the core services responsible for sentence analysis, generation, and moderation. Additionally, it applies the singleton instance of ConfigManager to manage configuration settings.

  • Method Details

    • analyzeSentence

      public Sentence analyzeSentence(String text, boolean saveSelected)
      Analyzes the syntax of a sentence and optionally saves the analyzed sentence to a file.
      Parameters:
      text - the input text to analyze.
      saveSelected - a boolean indicating whether the analyzed sentence should be saved to a file.
      Returns:
      an instance of Sentence containing the details of the analyzed sentence.
      Throws:
      AnalyzeException - if an error occurs during the analysis process.

    • generateSentence

      public Sentence generateSentence(String strategyName, String selStructure, boolean toxicity, boolean futureTense, boolean newWords, boolean saveSelected)
      Generates a sentence based on the specified strategy, input structure, and configuration options.
      Parameters:
      strategyName - The strategy for sentence structure determination (e.g., RANDOM, SAME, SELECTED).
      selStructure - The selected structure to use when the SELECTED strategy is applied.
      toxicity - Whether to moderate the generated sentence for toxicity.
      futureTense - Specifies whether to configure the sentence with a future verb tense.
      newWords - Configures if new words should be used in the generated sentence.
      saveSelected - Whether to save the generated sentence to a persistent storage.
      Returns:
      A Sentence object containing the generated sentence, structure, and related metadata.
      Throws:
      GenerateException - If the sentence generation process encounters an error.

    • clearAll

      public void clearAll()
      Resets the input and output sentences to a null state.

    • getOutputSentence

      public Sentence getOutputSentence()
      Provides the current output sentence generated or processed by the application.
      Returns:
      the current output Sentence instance, or null if no sentence has been processed or generated.
